DOC.brief_summary: The study prospective double blind . In clinic , patient undergo hysterectomy meet criterion inclusion study agree participate study randomize two group .
DOC.brief_title: Effect OF Nitrous Oxide On Acute Pain Opioid Consumption , Chronic Pain After Hysterectomy
DOC.detailed_description: The study prospective double blind . In clinic , patient undergo hysterectomy meet criterion inclusion study agree participate study randomize two group . In first group patient receive Nitrous Oxide In second group patient receive oxygen general anesthesia .
DOC.criteria: 18 65 year old time first procedure Female American Society Anesthesiologists physical status I II Hysterectomy undergo general anesthesia Neuropathic disease Chronic opioid user Contraindication Nitrous Oxide receive Consent obtain patient Psychiatric disorder Current recent drug abuse ( within past 6 month ) .
